General.Name: Okinawa Cellular Telephone Company
General.Description: Okinawa Cellular Telephone Company provides telecommunication and mobile phone services in Japan. Okinawa Cellular Telephone Company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Naha, Japan. Okinawa Cellular Telephone Company is a subsidiary of KDDI Corporation.

1.Name: Mr. Seiji  Yamamori
1.Title: Sr. MD, GM of Technology & Smart Work Promotion Department and Representative Director

2.Name: Mr. Takeyuki  Toguchi
2.Title: GM of Bus. Admin. Division & Director
